title: Border Still Not Showing Up for S8 Gold + Players?
body: Riot, When are you going to fix this?  We still dont have loading borders even though we made it to Gold last season???

replies.body:
There's nothing to fix.

Borders were changed in 9.2 to reflect what your **CURRENT** rank is.

They also update dynamically when you go up a tier (Bronze -> Silver for example)


The indicator of your S8 rank is this -

https://i.gyazo.com/fd4eac1dc047e0ed8812af9d97ecaf04.png
